# Introduction {-}

I wanted to start a project in R for some time as a chance to both practice techniques and highlight my (still developmental) skillset to any potential employers, colleagues or mentors. 

I have chosen to look at the UK housing market using this [data](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/about-the-price-paid-data#explanations-of-column-headers-in-the-ppd)
